aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.subtitle: Patient-Centered Care
aboutSection.name: Dr. Liudmyla Ryboichuk
about: Since 2011, she has been providing patients with comprehensive dental care.
A member of the Czech Dental Chamber.
She is committed to continuous education both in the Czech Republic and abroad.
She delivers high-quality care with an emphasis on an individual approach.
Specialization: conservative dentistry, endodontics, prosthetic and aesthetic dentistry.
aboutSection.missionDescription: At Miladent, our mission is to promote optimal oral health and create lasting, confident smiles.

learnMoreSection.title: Learn more about us
learnMoreSection.subtitle: Your smile matters to us
learnMoreSection.description1: We are a dedicated team committed to providing top-quality services. Our approach combines expertise, innovation, and care to ensure the best results for our clients.
learnMoreSection.description2: Our mission is to create an experience that is both engaging and effective, making sure every interaction brings value.

reviews.name: K.≈†.
reviews.text: A very skilled dentist. I didn‚Äôt feel anything during the root canal cleaning. The subsequent tooth restoration was done so well that I wouldn‚Äôt even notice it had been repaired. Pleasant music plays in the office.

reviews.name: Olena Burak
reviews.text: Thank you very much! Our whole family will continue to come only to you. My first visit was an emergency ‚Äì I was 32 weeks pregnant. They helped me a lot and treated everything. Once again, thank you very much!

reviews.name: Daria Butorova
reviews.text: The best dentistry in Prague. They are very careful and responsible. I am very afraid of dentists üôà, but I always go to Miladent with joy and without worry. I highly recommend them!

reviews.name: Pa≈°kov√°
reviews.text: Many thanks to the doctor, she is wonderful and kind, and for today‚Äôs standards her prices are very reasonable!

reviews.name: A.V.
reviews.text: A nice, new office with excellent transport accessibility. The doctor is very kind, and there was no waiting time at all (I had an appointment at 8, right at the start of office hours :).

reviews.name: Oleksandra Kolchar
reviews.text: I thank the doctor for correcting the situation caused by a dentist in Ukraine. I can warmly recommend her and I am very grateful for her humane approach.

reviews.name: Alina Malash
reviews.text: We thank the doctor for the excellent care. My husband and I have been visiting the clinic for several years for regular cleanings and dental treatments, and we have always been very satisfied. The approach is professional, thorough, and at the same time humane. We greatly appreciate the attention, calmness, and willingness to explain everything. We can only recommend them!

doctor.title: Specialist
doctor.name: Dr. Liudmyla Ryboichuk
about: Since 2011, she has been providing patients with comprehensive dental care.
A member of the Czech Dental Chamber.
She is committed to continuous education both in the Czech Republic and abroad.
She delivers high-quality care with an emphasis on an individual approach.
Specialization: conservative dentistry, endodontics, prosthetic and aesthetic dentistry.
doctor.quote: I understand each of you ‚Äî especially if you‚Äôve had unpleasant experiences with dental treatment in the past or haven‚Äôt paid much attention to your oral health until now. We give every patient time, patience, and gentle, pain-free care, always focusing on your comfort. We are here so that you don‚Äôt have to be afraid to come back, but instead return with the confidence that you are taking the very best care of your smile.

equipment.title: Modern equipment for your comfort
equipment.description: Cutting-edge technology meets patient comfort. Modern equipment ensures the highest standard of care.

items.name: Initial examination and consultation
items.title: We provide personal and individual advice

description.subtitle: We understand that choosing a dentist is an important decision.
description.text: That‚Äôs why clients with contractual insurance can have a FREE initial check-up to decide whether our approach and care suit them. The usual duration is 30 minutes. The initial examination is non-binding for both parties.

description.subtitle: How does the first visit look like?
list: You fill out a simple questionnaire
We perform an examination of teeth and gums
We take X-ray images
We prepare a treatment plan with an estimated price and procedure

items.name: Dental hygiene
items.title: Professional dental hygiene for healthy gums

description.subtitle: What does dental hygiene include?
list: removal of tartar and plaque
air polishing (AirFlow) for smooth and clean teeth
fluoride treatment to strengthen enamel
individual instruction for proper home care

description.text: Regular dental hygiene is the foundation of healthy teeth and gums. It helps prevent tooth decay, gum inflammation, and periodontitis.

description.subtitle: If you experience the following symptoms, you should book an appointment:
list: sensitivity to hot or cold drinks
mild pain when biting
dark spot or a ‚Äúhole‚Äù in the tooth
small cracks or chips
description.text: During the check-up, the doctor can detect early signs of decay. If it‚Äôs a cavity, the solution is a tooth filling.

description.subtitle: Replacing amalgam fillings with white composite ones
description.text: We offer gentle and aesthetic replacement of old amalgam fillings with modern white composite fillings.

description.subtitle: Advantages of white composite fillings:
list: natural appearance ‚Äì blends with the tooth color
strength and durability
less invasive treatment requiring minimal drilling

description.subtitle: Disadvantages of amalgam fillings:
list: may weaken the tooth due to expansion
contain mercury, which is now restricted
can cause discoloration of surrounding tooth tissue over time
description.text: If you want healthy teeth, contact us ‚Äî we‚Äôll recommend the best treatment method suited for you.

description.subtitle: If you suffer from:
list: severe tooth pain
intense pain accompanied by gum swelling or headache
pain when biting
inflammation in the root area
description.text: You probably need a root canal treatment (endodontics).
Thanks to modern procedures and equipment, we clean and disinfect the root canals and then fill them hermetically with a special material. After that, the tooth is restored.

description.subtitle: ALL PROCEDURES ARE PERFORMED USING A RUBBER DAM
description.text: (a rubber sheet surrounding the treated tooth, preventing contamination with saliva or blood, and keeping fluids from entering the throat during dental treatment)

items.name: Prosthetic dentistry
items.title: Tooth replacements with natural look and function

description.text: Prosthetics help replace missing or severely damaged teeth. Using modern methods and materials, we restore both function and natural aesthetics.
description.subtitle: What does prosthetics include?
list: crowns and bridges
veneers for aesthetic adjustments
partial and full removable dentures
modern fixed replacements on implants

description.subtitle: Intraoral scanner
description.text: A modern technology for fast and accurate scanning of your teeth and mouth without uncomfortable impression materials. The intraoral scanner creates a digital 3D model, allowing precise planning of treatments, crowns, veneers, or aligners. The procedure is comfortable, quick, and painless, with an instant visual result.

items.name: Teeth whitening
items.title: Safe whitening for a radiant smile

description.subtitle: We offer at-home teeth whitening at our clinic.
description.text: Based on your dental impressions/scans, we create perfectly fitting trays. A special gel is applied to the trays, which are worn for several hours ‚Äî preferably overnight when salivation is lower. The whitening process is repeated for 5‚Äì14 days according to the dentist‚Äôs or hygienist‚Äôs recommendation.

description.subtitle: Implant placement is a relatively simple surgical procedure you don‚Äôt need to worry about.
description.text: We start with a detailed analysis of your oral condition. Our dental implantologist carefully places the implant into your jawbone. The procedure is done under local anesthesia on a standard dental chair and takes about 30 minutes. After the procedure, you can go home normally. Healing takes 3‚Äì6 months, during which a strong bond forms between the bone and implant. The second phase is the placement of a crown on the implant.

We help reduce excessive jaw clenching (bruxism) and correct the condition where too much gum shows when smiling (‚Äúgummy smile‚Äù) through safe application of botulinum toxin. The procedure is quick, precise, and gentle, with natural-looking results that improve comfort and smile aesthetics. Combined with a night guard, excellent results in treating bruxism can be achieved.

pricesSection.title: Our Prices
description: This price list is for reference only ‚Äî an exact treatment estimate will be provided at the clinic
You can pay by mobile (bank transfer) or in cash
We cooperate with health insurance companies: VZP 111, ZPMV 211, OZP 207, ƒåPZP 205, ZP≈† 209
We accept child patients only if their parents are registered with us
